API Documentation¶

streamlib.summary¶

class streamlib.summary.CountMin(w=20, mu=5)[source]¶

Count-Min sketch.

__init__(w=20, mu=5)[source]¶

Create a new instance of CountMin.

Parameters:
  • w (int) – The number of buckets.
  • mu (int) – The number of repeated copies. Used to control the failure probability ~= 2^{-mu}
processBatch(dataStream, weighted=False)[source]¶

Summarize the given data stream.

Parameters:
  • dataStream – any iterable object with hashable elements. e.g. a list of integers.
  • weighted – if weighted, each item in dataStream should be (key, weight) pair, where weight > 0
processItem(item, weighted=False)[source]¶

Summarize the given data stream, but only process one item.

Parameters:
  • item – hashable object to be processed e.g. an integer
  • weighted – if weighted, each item should be a (key, weight) pair, where weight > 0
estimate(item)[source]¶

Estimate the frequency of given item.

Parameters:item – same type as elements in dataStream
Returns:estimated frequency of the given item.
Return type:int/real

streamlib.hashes¶

class streamlib.hashes.MurmurHash[source]¶

Murmur Hash Function.

hash(key)[source]¶

Return the hash value of key.

Parameters:key – can be any hashable object
Returns:
Return type:int
